sentence.Network_en: I know the full value of the snood.
sentence.Network_cn: 我懂得束发带的全部涵义.

进出口货物名称中英对照(201) ... Snogem 斯诺格姆牌手表 snood 妇女头带 snoop leak detector 漏气检测器.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English snōd, of unknown origin

means.word_mean: 1. an ornamental net in the shape of a bag that confines a woman's hair; pins or ties at the back of the head

auth_sentence.content: This time he had ditched the snood but he was just as scary.
